alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Windham, northeastern Washington, Kent and western Providence Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm near Glocester, or 11 miles west of Johnston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Warwick, Cranston, Coventry, West Warwick, Johnston, North Kingstown, Smithfield, Killingly, Burrillville, East Greenwich, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam, Richmond, Exeter, West Greenwich, Foster and Sterling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
